posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Eddie Collins portrait Sgc 5
posts.post_content:
**CARD IS SOLD**

If interested in Eddie please drop me a PM or email

They don't pop up often this nice. Color, clarity & centering are all top notch!

$2,500 delivered - PP FF preferred, but I'm open to discussing other means.

Thanks all, 
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]
